https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/g8trCScOYn63JCVfdUmOb8eJqGU.jpg In the desert of Crestone, Colorado, a group of SoundCloud rappers live in solitude, growing weed and making music for the internet. When an old friend arrives to make a movie, reality and fiction begin to blur. Crestone
